action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum -y install epel-release

sudo yum install -y yum-utils device-mapper-persistent-data lvm2
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
yum update -y xfsprogs
sudo yum install -y docker-ce
sudo systemctl start docker

sudo yum -y install nginx
sudo yum -y install git
mkdir /usr/share/uptick
cd /usr/share/uptick

git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git

chmod -R 755 /usr/share/uptick/
sed -i 's/\/usr\/share\/nginx\/html/\/usr\/share\/uptick\/uptick/g' /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
sed -i 's/NODE_SERVER_IP_ADDRESS/@@{platform.status.resources.nic_list[0].ip_endpoint_list[0].ip}@@/g' /usr/share/uptick/uptick/js/data.js

sed -i 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config
setenforce 0
systemctl enable docker
systemctl disable firewalld
systemctl stop firewalld
systemctl enable nginx
systemctl stop docker
systemctl start docker
docker run -d -p 3000:3000 thep/uplink:v2
systemctl start nginx

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum -y install epel-release

sudo yum install -y yum-utils device-mapper-persistent-data lvm2
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
yum update -y xfsprogs
sudo yum install -y docker-ce
sudo systemctl start docker

sudo yum -y install nginx
sudo yum -y install git
mkdir /usr/share/uptick
cd /usr/share/uptick

git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git

chmod -R 755 /usr/share/uptick/
sed -i 's/\/usr\/share\/nginx\/html/\/usr\/share\/uptick\/uptick/g' /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
sed -i 's/NODE_SERVER_IP_ADDRESS/@@{platform.status.resources.nic_list[0].ip_endpoint_list[0].ip}@@/g' /usr/share/uptick/uptick/js/data.js

sed -i 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config
setenforce 0
systemctl enable docker
systemctl disable firewalld
systemctl stop firewalld
systemctl enable nginx
systemctl stop docker
systemctl start docker
docker run -d -p 3000:3000 thep/uplink:v2
systemctl start nginx
